name: Doug and Lily
description: Doug and Lily go to rescue the child from wizard.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers, at least 512 MB of dedicated video memory and support for OpenGL 2.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
